column4: i installed wine-doors (a gui for wine)... which installed msttfcorefonts... now my firefox fonts look horrible... i tried uninstalling the ms fonts, but looks even worse... what should i do?
maybe you will have better chance in #winehq channel
in the wine channels they say ask in firefox channels, in firefox channels they say ask in ubuntu channels, and it seems like in ubuntu channels they say ask in wine channels  :)
do you have a problem with windows firefox, or linux firefox after this?
now you puzzled me. I always thought that those ms specific fonts for wine get installed in drive_c/windows/fonts folder.
yeah it's kinda strange

...but, since linux firefox gets screwed up because of this, they get installed to some linux folder. If they installed into wine folder, I might of been able to help, since I am a proin windows, not linux yet.
did you try the -  https://help.ubuntu.com/community/FontInstallHowto yet?
yep
did you check your firefox config, fonts section, maybe it just some settings changed in firefox?
do other programs look normal, other then firefox?
yes, everything else looks normal
at least it hasn't changed in a way that i can notice... but firefox is horrible
check the preferences in firefox, maybe it's just a matter of screwed up settings.
already did
did you try backing up your firefox profile and creating a new one, just to see if it changes some things?
yes, no results
I know that this is more like a windows approach, :-& , but perhaps: sudo apt-get install firefox --reinstall
already tried, no results

:) seems to me you've tried everything that I am suggesting, I don't have much experience with linux yet. I can't suggest anything else, I would start searching for something like: msttfcorefonts firefox in google.
